globalProperty.value: SELECT en.encounter_id,ob.date_created, ob.concept_id, ob.value_coded, ob.value_numeric, ob.value_text , ob.value_datetime, ob.person_id, pn.given_name, pn.family_name, p.uuid FROM visit v INNER JOIN encounter en ON en.visit_id = v.visit_id INNER JOIN obs ob ON ob.encounter_id = en.encounter_id INNER JOIN users us ON us.user_id = ob.creator INNER JOIN person_name pn ON pn.person_id = us.person_id INNER JOIN person p ON p.person_id = ob.person_id WHERE p.uuid = ${patientUuid} ORDER BY date_created DESC;
